name: 💀 SPIRIT CRYSTAL
description:
A SPIRIT CRYSTAL HAS APPEARED.

THIS CURSED CRYSTAL CONTAINS THE LOST SOULS OF THE LAST OF THE HUMAN RACE. 

A SPIRIT CRYSTAL CAN BE USED BY ANY CLAN MEMBER REGARDLESS OF WHETHER OR NOT THEY HOLD A SAMURAI BUT BEWARE, HE WHO USES THE CRYSTAL WILL NO LONGER BE ABLE TO BECOME A CLAN LEADER. 

PURCHASING THIS CRYSTAL WILL BURN ALL REMAINING SPIRITS AND SUMMON THE SAME NUMBER OF NEW SPIRITS.

PURCHASE RULES - 
NONE


GOOD LUCK 

👺
